ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in the world.  Try going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS or bronze and hoard it up
ygData.messageBody:
The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in the world. Try
going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS or bronze and hoard
it up till you are twice over your weight limit as an Iksar, then, try to
find a merchant to sell it too who wont kill you on sight.

Shelza, Karana
Berfurt, Karana


>From: "Bennett, Brian" <brian.bennett@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>To: "'EQ-Monks@egroups.com'" <EQ-Monks@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>Date: Thu, 27 Apr 2000 17:49:20 -0400
>
>Ok I promise this won't become the whineplay forum...
>
>Can someone point out a negative of the iksar? All I see so far is the 20%
>exp penatly. And they're butt ugly :)
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Carney [mailto:jcarney@...]
>Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 5:16 PM
>To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>
>
>Because the BASE is 100, not 0.
>
>100 + (Level * 5) = 120 at level 4.
>
>If the skill maxes out at 200, then at level 20 Iksar will stop getting
>swimming increases: 100 + (20 * 5) = 200.
>
>see?
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
>Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 4:56 PM
>To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>
>
>Dizzy J. writes:
>
> > most likely when you get to lvl 24 your swimming skill will start to
> > increase again.
>
>I understand what you're getting at here, but this makes me wonder why
>it would increase from 100 to 120 in the first place.
>
>
